targets.rawSql:
WITH amc as (
	select item.item_name, value, store.name as store_name
	from aggregator
	inner join store on store.id = aggregator.storeid
	inner join item on item.id = aggregator.itemid
	where dataElement = 'AMC'
	and store.name IN  ($store)
	and item.item_name IN ($item)
),
current_stock as (
	select item.item_name, sum(available * pack_size) as value from item_line
	inner join item on item.id = item_line.item_id
	inner join store on store.id = item_line.store_id
	where store.name  IN  ($store)
	and item.item_name IN ($item)
	group by item.item_name
)
select amc.store_name as "Store", amc.item_name as "Item", current_stock.value/amc.value as "Months of Stock" 
from amc
inner join current_stock on current_stock.item_name = amc.item_name

title: Months of Stock by Store and Item
